text: -  Chemotherapy.    -  Hormone therapy for tumors that are hormone receptor positive.    -  Radiation therapy.    -  Surgery.    -  Targeted therapy (trastuzumab).     - A clinical trial of a new treatment.        See the Metastatic Breast Cancer section for information about treatment options for breast cancer that has spread to parts of the body outside the breast, chest wall, or nearby lymph nodes.
